text: Hagi Agra Ra Anumzamo'a atruma hu'za nemaniza hanafi taminku'ma Pleiadesiema nehaza hanafitamina tro hunenteno, Agrake monafima Orioniema nehaza hanafitamina tro huntege'za remsa hu'za me'naze. Hagi Agra hanina eri ruzahe higeno masa fore nehie. Hagi Agra hagerimpintira tina eri atru huteno kora atregeno, mopafina ete eneramie. Hu'neankino Agri agi'a Ra Anumzane.
